name: agi-alpha-node-v0
description: Production-grade AGI Alpha Node runtime toolkit with ENS verification, staking orchestration, and observability.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:md && npm run lint:links
scripts.ci:solidity: npm run lint:sol && npm run test:sol
scripts.ci:ts: node scripts/render-subgraph-manifest.mjs && npm --prefix subgraph ci --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix subgraph run codegen:ci && npm --prefix subgraph run build:ci
scripts.ci:verify: npm run ci:lint && npm run ci:test && npm run ci:coverage && npm run ci:solidity && npm run ci:ts && npm run ci:security && npm run ci:policy && npm run ci:branch
scripts.prepare: node -e "const { existsSync } = require('node:fs'); const { join } = require('node:path'); const script = join(process.cwd(), 'scripts/prepare-husky.cjs'); if (!existsSync(script)) { console.log('husky prepare script missing; skipping'); process.exit(0); } require(script);"
